select history_seq.nextval from dual
insert into history values(#{historyId},#{historyProductId},#{historyType},sysdate,#{historyWarehouseId},#{historyQty} )
mapper.update: update history set history_product_id=#{historyProductId},history_type=#{historyType},history_date=#{historyDate},history_warehouse_id=#{historyWarehouseId} history_quantity=#{historyQty} where history_id=#{historyId}
mapper.select: SELECT h.history_id, h.history_product_id, h.history_type, h.history_date, h.history_warehouse_id, h.history_quantity, w.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_name, w.warehouse_location, w.warehouse_capacity, p.product_id, p.product_category, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.delivery_price, p.product_img FROM history h JOIN warehouse w ON h.history_warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id JOIN product p ON h.history_product_id = p.product_id WHERE h.history_id = #{historyId}

SELECT count(*) FROM history h JOIN warehouse w ON w.warehouse_id = h.history_warehouse_id JOIN product p ON p.product_id = h.history_product_id
WHERE ${search} LIKE #{word}
